class.name: SQLiteEnums
class.brief_description: Common enums used by the Godot SQLite plugin.
class.description: Result codes starting with "RC_SQLITE_" come directly from SQLite. Detailed descriptions for those result codes are available [url=https://sqlite.org/rescode.html]here[/url].

constants.constant: Error that does not correspond to any of the result codes defined by SQLite.
Don't print anything to the console.
Print essential information to the console.
Print additional information to the console.
